name: Fetch customer channel information with invalid Data i.e. cifKey too long

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930709001770"
When I fetch the channel information for CIF Key: "12345678901234567890"

children.description: Get customer channel info using http get: 12345678901234567890

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Forbidden Error

userStory.storyName: Fetch the channel information for a customer

title: Fetch customer channel information with invalid Data i.e. cifKey too long

tags.name: Fetch the channel information for a customer
